attributes.action: Stop the excess building of houses and closing of shops in Abingdon- the longest continuously inhabited town in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abingdon is rapidly becoming a ghost town, shop owners are unable to afford the business rates and the transport system & costly car parking are detering people from shopping there. Shops are closing down and are being replaced with more housing. The longest continuosly inhabited town in England is facing being wiped out.
